attributes.action: ensure that those in receipt of injectable medication for drugs or mental health dependency receive the vaccination or antiviral medication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those individuals who have these types of medication administered by the state or private sector should receive these immunisations and antivirals as a preventative measure to help them as well as the elderly. This should be done openly and transparently to show how humane a society the UK is and to show that any pandemic (in the words of Dickens) is not a measure to decrease
the surplus population.
